Titon.title: Titon
Titon.description: Base object that contains global functionality and configuration.

Module.title: Module
Module.description: Primary class that all sub-classes should extend from.

Class.Timers.title: Class.Timers
Class.Timers.description: Provides timer and interval management within the class layer.

Blackout.title: Blackout
Blackout.description: Displays a transparent black element over the entire website.

Flyout.title: Flyout
Flyout.description: Creates nested flyout menus that appear below an element that activates it.

Modal.title: Modal
Modal.description: Creates dynamic modals that will display above the content.

Tabs.title: Tabs
Tabs.description: Provides tabbed support to an element containing navigation tabs and sections.

Tooltip.title: Tooltip
Tooltip.description: Creates dynamic tooltips that will display at a specific element or the mouse cursor.

LazyLoad.title: LazyLoad
LazyLoad.description: Provides an easy way to lazy-load images while scrolling.
